name: Sneasel
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It uses its claws to poke holes in eggs so it can slurp out the insides. Breeders consider it a scourge and will drive it away or eradicate it.

attacks.name: Sneaky Smash
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you go second, and only on your first turn. Discard an Energy from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
